video.title: Dinosaur King
video.synopsis: Aided by tablets found near a downed meteorite, Max, Rex and Zoe race the evil Alpha Gang as they travel the globe in search of living dinosaurs.

episodes.synopsis: At a meteorite crash site, friends Max, Rex, and Zoe discover tablets and cards that bring a Triceratops to life -- and set villains on their trail.
episodes.title: Prehistory in the Making

episodes.synopsis: Rex and Zoe finally get the dino partners they've always wanted, which arrive just in time to join D-Team's trip to Egypt to stop a rampaging T. Rex.
episodes.title: Battle at the Pyramids

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Taylor heads for London museum on a research trip, only to discover that Alpha Gang -- with a live Saichania -- are lying in wait.
episodes.title: Tanks A Lot!

episodes.synopsis: While in the Amazon searching for a Saltosaurus, Max is separated from the rest of D-Team when he goes looking for Chomp, who's wandered off.
episodes.title: Bungle In The Jungle

episodes.synopsis: When the D-Team begins fighting among themselves, it takes a near-tragedy for them to realize the importance and strength of their friendship.
episodes.title: Rubble Trouble

episodes.synopsis: While in the Swiss Alps, Max, Zoe and Rex discover that the dinosaur they're tracking won't go without a fight.
episodes.title: Don't Mess With Maiasaura

episodes.synopsis: D-Team appears on TV when a quiz show announces a dino-themed contest, but with a poorly disguised Alpha Gang as rivals, will the game be fair?
episodes.title: A Game Show Showdown

episodes.synopsis: D-Team gets the chance for a vacation when a dino turns up in Hawaii and has Chomp to keep it company, but Alpha Gang soon ends their fun in the sun.
episodes.title: Maui Owie

episodes.synopsis: The loss of a night's sleep starts a feud between Max and Rex, who only put aside their argument when an Ankylosaurus threatens the city.
episodes.title: Dino Snore!

episodes.synopsis: While on a trip to the mall, Zoe, Max, and Rex find a cache of dinosaur cards and accidentally unleash a dino rampage on the unsuspecting shoppers.
episodes.title: Downtown Runaround

episodes.synopsis: A Suchomimus in the waters off Monaco is creating chaos in the kingdom, and D-Team are thrown in jail when they arrive to capture it.
episodes.title: Alpha Bets it All

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of a Ceratosaurus, D-Team travel to a remote island in the middle of the Pacific, unaware that it's the Alpha Gang's secret base.
episodes.title: Alpha's Zeta Point

episodes.synopsis: Taken hostage by the Alpha Gang, D-Team uncovers Dr. Z's plot to take over the world, but can they escape Alpha's island base in time to stop it?
episodes.title: Escape from Zeta Point

episodes.synopsis: In Rome, D-Team are beaten in the race to find a Pachycephalosaurus by Dr. Z himself, who has a personal reason for taking on this particular mission.
episodes.title: Child's Play

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team's well-deserved vacation is turned upside-down by an Acrocanthosaurus, the Alpha Gang and an erupting volcano.
episodes.title: Volcanic Panic

episodes.synopsis: D-Team must step in to save the day when Dr. Z loses control of his latest creation: a fire-breathing, remote-control Acrocanthosaurus.
episodes.title: All Fired Up!

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team, all soccer fans, are bound for South America, but meeting their favorite players will have to wait until they deal with Alpha Gang.
episodes.title: Field of Screams

episodes.synopsis: While D-Team tracks a Daspletosaurus on a remote tropical island, their own dinos enjoy the return to nature, which works to Alpha Gang's advantage.
episodes.title: Dance Evolution

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team races to New York City when Alpha Gang attempts to steal a powerful chunk of prehistoric amber from a museum.
episodes.title: The Big Apple Grapple

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team's online deal for a new dino card involves swiping some golf clubs from Max's dad, who's too absorbed in watching the game on TV to notice.
episodes.title: Tee'd Off

episodes.synopsis: While an air traffic controller struggles to save Reese after a mid-air collision, Max and Zoe scramble to get an escaped Megaraptor off the runway.
episodes.title: Just Plane Crazy

episodes.synopsis: New Loch Ness Monster sightings draw D-Team, who find that Alpha Gang's behind the phenomenon. But nobody expects what they find under the water.
episodes.title: A Loch Ness Mess

episodes.synopsis: In Paris to track a dinosaur, the D-Team finds their search complicated by a fashion fad that has the locals dressing up like dinos themselves.
episodes.title: Fashion Victims

episodes.synopsis: D-Team's attempt to stop Alpha Gang from extracting the ore from an Alpha Metal mine is complicated by the appearance of a new dinosaur.
episodes.title: A Miner Disaster

episodes.synopsis: When they see Alpha Gang robbing a bank, D-Team discovers that the thieves are lookalike impostors who've teamed up with Dr. Z to double his strength.
episodes.title: Double or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Alpha Gang's new dinosaur theme park, members of D-Team help prevent a rampage by the attraction's real-life dinos.
episodes.title: Carnival of Chaos

episodes.synopsis: While researching fossils for a school project, the members of D-Team stumble upon one of Dr. Z's genetically altered dinos and attempt to save it.
episodes.title: Daddy Dearest

episodes.synopsis: In Kenya, Max and the D-Team encounter poachers in league with Alpha Gang, who are using Ursula's T. Rex to hunt local wildlife and a new dino.
episodes.title: Rhino or Dino?

episodes.synopsis: D-Team tries to get through to Reese, unaware that she's lost her cell phone and, thanks to Nightingale Syndrome, attracted to a member of Alpha Gang.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Amour!

episodes.synopsis: Alpha Gang infiltrates a forbidden temple and awakens a sleeping dinosaur guardian that D-Team must confront if everyone's to get out alive.
episodes.title: Temple Tempest

episodes.synopsis: Rex, who's trying to help Ace, his Carnotaurus, overcome his fear of water, isn't happy with the D-Team's new mission: Niagara Falls!
episodes.title: Falls Alarm!

episodes.synopsis: A captive princess unleashes and befriends a rare dinosaur in India, but can D-Team protect her when the Alphas learn of her discovery?
episodes.title: Battle Royale!

episodes.synopsis: Max's self-styled ninja skills go to his head when he attempts to take on three Deinonychus by himself, unaware that they're ninjas, too.
episodes.title: Ninja Nightmare!

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team race Ursula to Australia to capture an Iguanodon, and are shocked by her apparent kindness when she gets to the dino first.
episodes.title: Ruff and Ready

episodes.synopsis: D-Team faces a genetically enhanced Velociraptor when they try to stop Alpha Gang from taking Alpha Metal to rebuild their base.
episodes.title: Metal Imbalance

episodes.synopsis: In Oklahoma, Rod and Laura persuade Max to enter a rodeo so that they can nab a Sauraphaganax for the Alpha Gang.
episodes.title: Dueling Dinos

episodes.synopsis: In Cambodia, the D-Team learns that the newest dino is a creature of local legend, which causes some problems when the creature goes on the rampage.
episodes.title: Mythical Mix Up

episodes.synopsis: A celebrity chef visiting Chinatown has everyone eager to eat, but dinner will have to wait when a Mapusaurus shows up on D-Team's tablets.
episodes.title: Beast or Famine

episodes.synopsis: Max has an extra reason to track down an Allosaurus in Barcelona: his mother's visiting the city, and she's right in the fast-moving dino's path!
episodes.title: A Mesozoic Mess

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Owen is hired as a technical adviser on a dinosaur movie, a real dino appears on the set to throw the production into chaos.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Destruction!

episodes.synopsis: Seth's plot to take over Alpha Gang starts with the capture of an Ampelosaurus in Russia, but he'll have to get to it before Max and the D-Team.
episodes.title: Planes, Trains and Dinosaurs

episodes.synopsis: As dinosaur flu plagues the Alpha Gang, Dr. Z's crew uses a new teleportation device to bring Zoe's father to the island.
episodes.title: Vaccination Vacation

episodes.synopsis: When Max and Rex's fathers take the D-Team to Kyoto, the kids hunt for a Fukuisaurus, while the dads are on the trail of the city's lovely geishas.
episodes.title: A Kyoto Caper

episodes.synopsis: Max's mother invites his "friends" in for Christmas festivities, unaware that they're members of the Alpha Gang there to steal his dino cards.
episodes.title: Santa Saurus!

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Z's attempt to stop Seth's treachery in its tracks ends in disaster, and D-Team begins to suspect that Alpha Gang is from the future.
episodes.title: Full Scheme Ahead

episodes.synopsis: As D-Team hunts for Alpha Team's hidden base, they learn that Rex is actually from the future, a side effect of Seth and Dr. Z's treachery.
episodes.title: Tricks of the Traitor

episodes.synopsis: When Seth releases his genetically enhanced black T. Rex against his former teammates, Max and the D-Team are forced into an alliance with Alpha Gang.
episodes.title: One Final Move!

episodes.synopsis: While Max and Chomp set out to destroy the Alpha Gang's time machine, the rest of D-Team faces off against Seth's genetically modified black T. Rex.
episodes.title: Dinosaur War!

episodes.synopsis: D-Team must join forces with the Alpha Gang when Max's house -- with all the D-Team parents inside -- vanishes into thin air.
episodes.title: Alien Parent Trap

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team use their time machine to visit ancient Rome, where they encounter a space pirate armed with his own dinosaurs and cards.
episodes.title: Ancient Roman Holiday

episodes.synopsis: In ancient Rome, the D-Team meets Spartacus's sister Sofia, who happens to be in possession of the first Cosmos Stone that the gang seeks.
episodes.title: Desperately Seeking Spartacus

episodes.synopsis: Still in ancient Rome, the members of D-Team visit the Colosseum, where dinosaurs are added to the custom of gladiatorial combat.
episodes.title: Coliseum Clash

episodes.synopsis: Who can resist when famed gladiator Spartacus battles a dinosaur in the Roman Colosseum? Not Max and his friends, who decide to join the fray.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Rome

episodes.synopsis: In 1718, a Caribbean treasure map leads the way to the second Cosmos Stone for D-Team, but the space pirates -- and sea pirates -- are close behind.
episodes.title: Dinosaurs of the Caribbean

episodes.synopsis: Max and his friends get some unlikely help from the Alpha Gang as they battle Blackbeard for possession of a treasure map to the next Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: X-treme Map Quest

episodes.synopsis: All-out war rages in the Caribbean as D-Team and their dinosaurs battle pirates of space and sea on, below and above the water.
episodes.title: High Sea Chase

episodes.synopsis: With the Second Cosmos Stone almost within reach for D-Team, Blackbeard and the space pirates, a dinosaur battle will decide its fate.
episodes.title: Amazing Treasure Race

episodes.synopsis: In ancient China, the D-Team befriends a monk whose skills can lead them to the next Cosmos Stone ... if the space pirates don't get to it first.
episodes.title: Four Part Harmony

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of the space pirates, D-Team's mission is interrupted when they must defend a village and rescue a kidnapped Sanzo Hoshi.
episodes.title: Elements of Surprise

episodes.synopsis: The D-Team realize that Sanzo Hoshi is slowing their progress and decide to leave him behind, but the elderly monk isn't about to go without a fight.
episodes.title: Monk in the Middle

episodes.synopsis: D-Team must rescue Sanzo Hoshi before the space pirates can force him to use his powers to lead them to the third Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: The Third Cosmos Stone

episodes.synopsis: After Jonathan rescues the D-Team from China, the Pterosaur leads the D-Team to ancient Japan to search for the next Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: Two Shoguns Are Better Than One

episodes.synopsis: Both the space pirates and a band of ninjas attempt to stop D-Team and the Shogun in their search for the next Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: The No-Fun Shogun

episodes.synopsis: In feudal Japan, D-Team joins forces with the Shogun to find the next Cosmos Stone, but the trail leads to a cave hideout of the space pirates.
episodes.title: Dinosaurs, Ninjas and Bears! Oh My!

episodes.synopsis: Max, Rex and Zoe must prevent all-out chaos when Zoe's father pretends to be the Shogun and takes control of the Japanese army.
episodes.title: There's No Business like Shogun Business

episodes.synopsis: In ancient Persia, Princess Zahrah offers to help D-Team search for the next Cosmos Stone, but she needs something in return.
episodes.title: The 39 Thieves

episodes.synopsis: Alpha Gang and 39 thieves stand in the way of D-Team's quest to save the princess and find the next Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: Desert Heat

episodes.synopsis: Princess Zahrah's kingdom is under siege by marauders and dinosaurs, but D-Team lends their help even as they hunt for the next Cosmos Stone.
episodes.title: Princess of the City

episodes.synopsis: The race against the space pirates for the next Cosmos Stone goes on, even as Max and the D-Team defend the kingdom of Princess Zahrah.
episodes.title: Malice In The Palace

episodes.synopsis: While racing the space pirates for the next Cosmos Stone in 17th-century France, D-Team meets D'Artagnan and his Musketeers as a gang of teenagers.
episodes.title: The French Conniption

episodes.synopsis: With the space pirates right behind them, the D-Team hunts for the stone while Max tries to warn Princess Anne of Chancellor Richelieu's treachery.
episodes.title: The Wee Musketeers

episodes.synopsis: Max, Rex and Zoe attempt to find the next Cosmos Stone while eluding Chancellor Richelieu's soldiers, who seem to be watching their every move.
episodes.title: All For One

episodes.synopsis: Ghosts aren't the only thing to fear when D-Team hunts for the next Cosmos Stone in a haunted castle; the space pirates are just a step behind them.
episodes.title: The Haunted Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Max's attempt to deal with the space pirates lands him and his friends in the Jurassic Period, where they encounter a familiar face.
episodes.title: Bad Deal

episodes.synopsis: D-Team must return to the Jurassic Era when they learn that a fire they set there has caused mutations in plant and animal life and may doom mankind.
episodes.title: The Forest Fire Effect

episodes.synopsis: As the search nears its end, Max and his friends race the space pirates to find the final Cosmos Stone, with the fate of the universe in the balance.
episodes.title: The Search for the Last Cosmos Stone

episodes.synopsis: The members of D-Team face the space pirates and Seth in a race to find the seven Cosmos Stones, all while trying to save their parents from Spectre.
episodes.title: Clash for the Cosmos Stones

episodes.synopsis: With the seven Cosmos Stones finally joined together, D-Team discovers that the fate of the universe rests on their abilities.
episodes.title: Fate of the Cosmos
